summary: The diff appears to implement deep-linking from PreMeditationPage to KnowledgePage using a category search param, and updates KnowledgePage to initialize/select category from that param while preserving the existing scrollToContent behavior and clearing only that flag after scrolling.

hallucinated_features.description: PreMeditationPage changes beyond the specified single “More details” button update (e.g., responsive slider width tweaks, light/dark background behavior changes, lotus intensity/variant changes, ritual instant-start via search params, additional cloud-sync error mapping).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits REQ-1 to only updating the selected “More details” button element’s navigation behavior; these additional behaviors are not requested and are outside the stated scope/non-goals.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage summary mentions multiple unrelated UI/behavior changes)
